channel.title: MySQL - Highscores / Vote Page
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape,
I've been trying to find ways to approach this, I've looked around and haven't really gotten so much help from it so I've decided to post here and hopefully get some answers that will help me do this. What I want to do, well my main priority is to make a highscores system for my server. It was a blank Project Insanity server that I've started to code, not majorly but minorly. I want to add highscores system and then eventually a Voting system can anyone give me help.
Some things you can help me with;
[ul][li]What programs do I need.[/li] [li]How do I get the highscores page.[/li] [li]How do I set up the highscores.[/li][/ul]
and more, I hope you can help.
Thanks,
Runescape-Xperia.
